Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

Interface CornerListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
PlayAreaPanel, PlayerHandPanel
public interface CornerListener
This interfaced defines a corner listener.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    placeOnCorner(String cardID, GamePoint position, CornerDirection direction)
    Positions the selected card on top of the clicked corner.

  • Method Details

    • placeOnCorner

      void placeOnCorner(String cardID, GamePoint position, CornerDirection direction) throws IllegalStateException
      Positions the selected card on top of the clicked corner.
      Parameters:
      cardID - identifier of the card on which the corner is placed
      position - corner's card position
      direction - corner direction relative to the center of the card
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if no card is selected
